segments.text: Good afternoon , how can I be of service today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My company wants to become involved in your Comprehensive Credit Granting . We are a very young company and I'm not at all sure if we meet your credit requirements .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is possible to take into account special circumstances , should the manager agree to it . If your credit rating has been class A in your initial trading period and your debt to asset ratio is sound , and then I'm sure the manager will see you to discuss it further . I'll set up a meeting for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be wonderful . Thank you so much for all of your help .
segments.speaker: S2
